strings:
<voice_0x01000F39><se_def>Prince Charmles: Ah, there you are!
And you've arrived just in time...
<voice_0x01000F3A><se_def>Prince Charmles: Without further ado, allow me to present my NEW Argon heart!
<voice_0x01000F3B><se_def>Prince Charmles: The biggest you ever saw!
<voice_0x01000F3C><se_def>Prince Charmles: I mean, you've seen a real Argon heart for yourselves. You can tell this is no fake.
<voice_0x01000F3D><se_def>Prince Charmles: I suppose you're wondering where I acquired it. Well, as luck would have it, one of the peddlers was selling one!

<voice_0x01000F3E><se_def>*: Service is our motto.
We gots another if you gots the money.
<voice_0x01000F3F><se_def>Prince Charmles: Another...!? One is quite enough!
<voice_0x01000F40><se_def>Prince Charmles: Anyway. You can keep the Argon heart from the royal hunting ground for yourselves.

<voice_0x01000F41><se_def>Prince Charmles: I'm going to take this one back to the castle.
You'll stay quiet about this, of course.

<voice_0x01000F42><se_def>Prince Charmles: And once the bazaar moves on, I won't need to worry about that peddler telling anyone.
It's a flawless plan! Ha ha ha!

<voice_0x01000F43><se_def>Prince Charmles: Well, this is farewell. I'm off to the castle.
Drop by some time if you'd like to see the adoration on my subjects' faces first-hand!
Ta-ta!
